ai.summary: A very short, easy hike on the Illogan FP 29 footpath in the UK. At 0.3 km, it’s a gentle stroll suitable for beginners and families.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gently rolling footpath with a well-trodden surface. Expect grassy or compact earth underfoot; possible minor uneven patches and occasional mud after rain.
ai.safety_notes: As with any outdoor walk, check the forecast before you go. Wear comfortable footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Stay on marked paths, be mindful of livestock or private land if present, and carry a phone with emergency contacts. In low light or poor weather, visibility and footing can deteriorate quickly.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation (or GPS device)
Sunscreen, hat or sunglasses for sunny days
ai.best_seasons: Year-round; conditions are usually pleasant in spring and autumn, but the path can be enjoyed any season with appropriate gear.

seo.title: Illogan FP 29 – Easy 0.3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the Illogan FP 29, a brief and easy 0.3 km hike in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, gear recommendations, and best seasons for this short trail.
